column2: "Okay, now that I have your report, your exploration request can proceed. We look forward to bigger and better things from you."
"At least, that's what the ARKS Code Reporting Section says I should say. Now, I'm going to go off the record here."
"The Dragonkin of Volcanic Caverns have been extremely hostile toward ARKS lately. There have been reports of numerous injuries."

"You're bound to get excited about new areas to explore, but use caution, and don't let yourself get carried away. You've worked hard to get this far. I really hope you don't throw it all away by doing something foolish."
